system.description: Automatically equipped in each empty hand slot.

This weapon possesses the modifications of Accurate, Magic Defense Boost, and Powerful.

See Custom Weapons for details.

summary.value: Ignore the warnings of this World at your own risk.

system.description:
ALSO: Battle Mage, Geomancer, Sorcerer

An Elementalist has learned to channel the souls that flow within the basic elements of creation: Air, Earth, Fire and Water. Some of them develop complex spells to contain the powerful energies of nature; others seek its protection in harmony and communion. Elemental magic can be highly destructive, causing damage and inflicting negative status effects. Due to this, there are many who would covet an Elementalist’s abilities… often for nefarious purposes.

ELEMENTALIST FREE BENEFITS
  • Permanently increase your maximum Mind Points by 5
  • You may perform Rituals whose effects fall within the Ritualism discipline.

ELEMENTALIST SKILLS

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.muhtqtJ6av32K34Z]{Cataclysm} (SL3)

When you cast an instantaneous spell, if you have an arcane weapon equipped, you may increase the spell’s total MP cost by up to 【SL × 10】 Mind Points. If you do so and the spell deals damage to one or more creatures, it will deal 5 extra damage to each creature for every 10 Mind Points by which you increased its total MP cost.

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.zlmL0suZwTCQYzE5]{Elemental Magic} (SL10)

Each time you acquire this Skill, learn one Elementalist spell (see Core Rulebook, page 188).
Offensive ( @ICON[offensive] ) Elementalist spells use 【INS + WLP】 for the Magic Check. 

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.b5zzfsWN7h5ugrnW]{Magic Artillery} (SL3)

When you cast an offensive ( @ICON[offensive] ) spell, if you have an arcane weapon equipped, you gain a bonus to your Magic Check equal to 【SL × 2】 .

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.qgy43lWGmJ2YGhTp]{Ritual Elementalism}

You may perform Rituals whose effects fall within the Elementalism discipline.
Elementalism Rituals use 【INS + WLP】 for the Magic Check.

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.v6rTedHMjbLuLdN3]{Spellblade} (SL4)

When you cast an offensive ( @ICON[offensive] ) spell targeting a single creature, if the spell has a total Mind Point cost of 【SL × 10】or lower and you have one or more bow, brawling, dagger, flail, spear or sword weapons equipped, you may choose one of those weapons. If you do, your Magic Check for the spell will use the chosen weapon’s Accuracy Check formula; for instance, the Magic Check for an Elementalist spell cast through a bronze sword (Core Rulebook, page 131) will be 【DEX + MIG】+1 instead of 【INS + WLP】 .

ELEMENTALIST SPELLS

  • For spell breakdown and a list of Elemental Spells, refer to: @UUID[Compendium.projectfu.handouts.JournalEntry.hK8r8lsQNaknSqdq]{Elementalist Rules}

summary.value: What we seek is to help people, not words of appreciation.

system.description:
ALSO: Champion, Chosen One, Savior

Often written in legends, a Hero is the embodiment of light and hope in a land plagued by darkness and despair. Together with their fellow companions, heroes travel the world seeking to help people in need and defeat forces of evil. Their only true reward, is maybe one day being remembered by those whose lives they impacted.

HERO FREE BENEFITS

  • Permanently increase your maximum Hit Points by 5.

  • Gain the ability to equip martial shields, and choose one: gain the ability to equip martial melee weapons; or gain the ability to equip martial ranged weapons.

HERO SKILLS

@UUID[Compendium.fabula-ultima-homebrew.homebrew-skills.Item.MCrVhNlP4jbzdJi6]{A Hero's Purpose} (SL3)

Once per session, when you save one or more NPCs from danger, complete a quest for one or more NPCs, or one or more Villains reach 0 Ultima Points while you are present on the scene, you gain 【SL】 Fabula Points.

@UUID[Compendium.fabula-ultima-homebrew.homebrew-skills.Item.4NcCRrGyuuOrgI8J]{It Was Destiny}

Once per session, you may spend a Fabula Point to create a new Bond towards someone or something, or add an emotion to one of your existing Bonds; this doesn’t require an action, but during a conflict it can only be done on your turn, while no effect is being resolved. Explain how destiny affected your relationships!

@UUID[Compendium.fabula-ultima-homebrew.homebrew-skills.Item.qg39quSjbKuvHLPo]{Power Of Friendship} (SL2)

You gain a number of extra Bond slots equal to 【SL】 .

Additionally, when you invoke a Bond to improve the Accuracy Check of an attack, that attack deals extra damage equal to 【the strength of that Bond】 .

@UUID[Compendium.fabula-ultima-homebrew.homebrew-skills.Item.iIBms0agbwthfoEz]{Resolve} (SL5)

During a conflict, you may use an action and spend a Fabula Point to recover from all status effects and also recover 【10 + (SL x 10)】 Mind Points.

@UUID[Compendium.fabula-ultima-homebrew.homebrew-skills.Item.89brp9KWRYdJlvgZ]{Ties That Bind} (SL5)

When you invoke a Bond, you may choose an ally present on the scene: they recover 【SL x 4】 Hit Points or Mind points (your choice). If the Bond you invoked is with the ally you chose, that ally instead recovers both 【SL x 4】 it Points and Mind Points.

HEROIC SKILLS

“Mastery of the Hero Class” is included in the Requirements of the following existing Heroic Skills: Disarming Rhetoric, Heroic Companion, and Unbreakable (Core Rulebook, pages 235, 236 and 240, respectively), Arcane Soldier (Techno Fantasy Atlas, page 171), and Brave Bash and Cheer Up! (Natural Fantasy Atlas, page 163).

@UUID[Compendium.fabula-ultima-homebrew.homebrew-heroic-skills.Item.lrhl1WGyjTLvgV3B]{Fabula Impetum}

@UUID[Compendium.fabula-ultima-homebrew.homebrew-heroic-skills.Item.DmzhRK2b6wNM1MKN]{Heroic Aura}

@UUID[Compendium.fabula-ultima-homebrew.homebrew-heroic-skills.Item.V5zFlTpLppmjoXuZ]{Making Legend}

CREDIT

Class Design, Writing and Development Tails (@tailspr)

Layout by Ophan, based on the official Fabula Ultima layout by Emanuele Galletto

ALSO: Fighter, Rōnin, Warrior

Weaponmasters spend years upon years honing their close combat arts. Most of them display remarkable skill with a variety of weapons; others have trained to become one with a specific armament. Many Weaponmasters follow and protect someone out of love or loyalty, but there are also those who tirelessly wander the world seeking worthy opponents, legendary magical weapons, or capable teachers.

WEAPONMASTER FREE BENEFITS
  • Permanently increase your maximum Hit Points by 5.
  • Gain the ability to equip martial melee weapons and martial shields.

WEAPONMASTER SKILLS

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.IhBCZsilt0bj5RJK]{Bladestorm}

When you perform a melee attack, you may spend 10 Mind Points to choose one option: the attack gains multi (2); or you increase the attack’s multi property by one, up to a maximum of multi (3).

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.7jWycVYFgZ1BMxch]{Bone Crusher} (SL4)

When you hit one or more targets with a melee attack that would deal damage, you may have the attack deal no damage. If you do, choose one option: inflict dazed on each target hit by the attack; or inflict weak on each target hit by the attack; or each target hit by the attack loses 【SL × 10】 Mind Points. Describe your maneuver!

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.WZDdQfw9VF64La2P]{Breach} (SL3)

You may use an action and spend 5 Mind Points to perform a free attack with a melee weapon you have equipped. This attack must target a single creature. If the attack is successful, it deals no damage and you choose one option: you destroy one shield equipped by the target; or you destroy the target’s equipped armor; or whenever the target suffers damage from a source before the start of your next turn, that source deals 【SL × 2】 extra damage to them.

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.XhcTVGtGEk7L2Ddq]{Counterattack}

After an enemy hits or misses you with a melee attack, if the Result of their Accuracy Check was an even number, you may perform a free attack against that enemy (after their attack has been fully resolved). This attack must be a melee attack and must have that enemy as its only target; treat your High Roll (HR) as 0 when calculating damage dealt by this attack.

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.ztxLYzo1ADCaRupR]{Melee Weapon Mastery} (SL4)

You gain a bonus equal to 【SL】 to all Accuracy Checks with melee weapons.

During a conflict, you may use an action and spend a Fabula Point to recover from all status effects and also recover 【10 + (SL × 10)】 Mind Points.

  • You Spend: @LOSS[1 fp]

  • You Recover: @GAIN[10 + ($sl*10) mp]{10 + (SL × 10) MP}
When you perform a melee attack, you may spend 10 Mind Points to choose one option: the attack gains multi (2); or you increase the attack's multi property by one, up to a maximum of multi (3).

Each time you acquire this Skill, learn one Elementalist spell (see Core Rulebook, page 188).

Offensive ( @ICON[offensive] ) Elementalist spells use 【INS + WLP】 for the Magic Check.

  • For spell breakdown and a list of Elemental Spells, refer to: @UUID[Compendium.projectfu.handouts.JournalEntry.hK8r8lsQNaknSqdq]{Elementalist Rules}

When you cast an offensive ( @ICON[offensive] ) spell targeting a single creature, if the spell has a total Mind Point cost of 【SL × 10】 or lower and you have one or more bow, brawling, dagger, flail, spear, or sword weapons equipped, you may choose one of those weapons. If you do, your Magic Check for the spell will use the chosen weapon's Accuracy Check formula; for instance, the Magic Check for an Elementalist spell cast through a bronze sword (Core Rulebook, page 131) will be 【DEX + MIG】 + 1 instead of 【INS + WLP】.

effects.name: Spellblade
effects.description: Your Magic Check for spells will use the chosen weapon's Accuracy Check formula.

system.description:
You imbue a weapon with elemental energy. Choose a damage type: air, bolt, earth, fire, or ice. Until this spell ends, all damage dealt by the weapon becomes of the chosen damage type. If you have that weapon equipped while you cast this spell, you may perform a free attack with it as part of the same action.

This spell can only be cast on a weapon equipped by a willing creature.

  • Targets Receive: @WEAPON[air bolt earth fire ice]{Elemental Weapon}

You send lightning striking at your foe. The target suffers 【HR + 25】bolt damage.

Damage dealt by this spell ignores Resistances.

summary.value: This allows the entire group to rest in the wilderness and at sea.

system.description: For 4 Inventory Points, this allows the entire group to rest in the wilderness and at sea.

summary.value: One creature suffers 10 damage of a type of your choice (10 Air, 10 Bolt, 10 Earth, 10 Fire, or 10 Ice).

system.description:
For 2 Inventory Points, one creature suffers 10 damage of a type of your choice (air, bolt, earth, fire, or ice).

  • Target Suffers: @DMG[10 air], @DMG[10 bolt], @DMG[10 earth], @DMG[10 fire], or @DMG[10 ice]

summary.value: One creature recovers from a single status effect.

system.description: For 2 Inventory Points, one creature recovers from a single status effect.
For 3 Inventory Points, one creature recovers @HEAL[50 mp].
For 3 Inventory Points, one creature recovers @HEAL[50 hp].
